name: Fairy Dust: Tales of Etherea.
blurb: Fairy Dust is a 2D platformer RPG with point and click adventure elements, where you get to play all sorts of interesting characters!

rewards.reward: --------------Blood Donor--------------\r\nThank you for your support everyone here at Megaz Entertainment Studios is eternally grateful for your help. We want to invite you to our Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and YouTube channel where you get to speculate about the game and offer suggestions about concepts and the features of the game.\r\nAlso you will get access to exclusive wallpapers only for you the backers of fairy dust and your friends.

---------------Supporter-------------------

 A Digital Copy of the finished Game when finished. This version of the game you can share with your friends with no restrictions.
-------------------------

And you get your name, nickname or 
Company name shown in the credit
Section of the game in (Copper Letters).

--------------Early Bird--------------

Posters: 
You get two kickstarter exclusive posters of your choice (unsigned).

--------------Collector--------------

Exclusive release of Artwork ( in PDF ).     
------------------------------------------------

A custom keychain with the character of your choice
-------------------------------
And you get your name, nickname, channel 
or company name shown in the credit
Section of the game in (Silver Letters).

--------------Companion--------------

Poster Promotion Limited edition:
You get both posters which will be
SIGNED by the artists and developers.
------------Fellowship member------------\r\nName an NPC:\r\nYou get to name a character in the game
-------------Lord of the House-------------\r\n\r\nName and Design your own House/Castle/Cave in the Game.

--------------Master Collector--------------
 
OWN a piece of Concept Art:
You get to own an original piece of
Concept art signed by the artist.

-----------------Big Daddy-----------------

Kickstarter Exlusive Version of FairyDust:
For supporting us this much you get an exclusive version of the finished game that includes an additional playable character, only available for those people that backed us this heavily. This character is a developer tool that allows us to play all the quests and aspects of the game. 

----------------------------------------------------


And you get your name, nickname or 
Company name shown in the credit
Section of the game (in Gold Letters).

-----------------Advertiser-----------------
(This pledge is separate and applies to its content only)
Get your Self, Product, Shop or even Company logo, incorporated in to the world of the game. In the form of a picture, sign, an in game replica of your product or even an in game replica of your shop.  
---------------------------------------------------


And you get your name, nickname or 
Company name shown in the credit
Section of the game (in Gold Letters).

--------------Entrepreneur-------------- 

Get Animated as an NPC in the Taverns/Bars/Shops/Houses
Optional (you can even make the back-story and side quest connected to your NPC or even do the voice over for this character)
You need to submit two photographs of yourself. 

------------------


A custom keychain depicting your character. (One of a kind)

-----------------

If we reach more than 50k You will also get ONE invite for our three day long celebratory summer party organized fully by us.

--------------Big Advertiser--------------\r\n(This pledge is separate and applies to its content only)\r\nGet your Self, mascot, Product, Building or Company, incorporated in to the game and actively involved in to one of the side quests.

--------------Evil Overlord--------------

Get Animated as a Boss Character. 
You get to choose your race, clothes, abilities and powers.
(You need to submit two photographs of yourself)

----------------------------------------------------

A custom keychain depicting your character. (One of a kind)

---------------


If we reach more than 50k you will also get TWO invitations for two people to go to our three day long celebratory summer party.

--------------Hero--------------

Get Animated as a Playable Character
You get to choose your race, clothes, abilities and powers.
You need to submit two photographs of yourself.

----------------------------------------------------

A custom keychain depicting your character.(One of a kind) 

-----------------


If we reach more than 50k you will also get ONE invitation for our three day long celebratory summer party including FREE food, drinks and all other activities.

------------Monumental Glory------------

Get immortalized as a big time sponsor of the game. 
You get to put your name in the opening credits of the game.
Optional (you can put your picture or logo in the opening credits).

--------------

If we reach more than 50k you will also get TWO invitations for two people for our three day long 
celebratory summer party including FREE food, drinks and all other activities.

--------------Legendary--------------
 
Full tour of our studio followed by a lunch with the developers.

------------------------

If we reach more than 50k you will get an all expenses paid summer party invitation including all travel expenses, food, drinks and other activities.
